import React from'react';import validValue from'../Service/ValidValue';var validForm=function validForm(form){var array=[];for(var x in form){array.push({id:x,config:form[x]});}for(var _x in form){var name=_x;console.log(name);console.log(form[_x].validation);if(form[_x].validation.required){console.log(form[_x].validation.required);if(form[_x].value===""){console.log(_x);return{id:_x,error:"this "+_x+" is requried"};}}var valid=validValue(form[_x].value,form[_x].validation,_x);if(valid!=null)return valid;};return null;// return obj;
};export default validForm;
